tasks.title: Project Structure Foundation
tasks.description: Create highlight.xyz compatible project structure with q5.js WebGPU renderer and hl-gen.js integration
tasks.details: Set up basic project structure with index.html, main.js, package.json, and library dependencies. Remove React dependencies and configure for q5.js deployment.
tasks.testStrategy: npm run build && npm run dev to verify structure works

subtasks.title: Create HTML Entry Point
subtasks.description: CREATE index.html with q5.js and hl-gen.js imports
subtasks.details: Create HTML entry point with proper script loading order and WebGPU support detection
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify HTML loads without errors and scripts are accessible

subtasks.title: Configure Package Dependencies
subtasks.description: CREATE package.json removing React dependencies, adding q5.js and build tools
subtasks.details: Remove React/Vite dependencies, add q5.js, webpack, and highlight.xyz deployment tools
subtasks.testStrategy: npm install && npm run dev succeeds

subtasks.title: Setup hl-gen.js Library
subtasks.description: CREATE lib/hl-gen.js from highlight.xyz GitHub repository
subtasks.details: Download latest hl-gen.js from highlight.xyz GitHub and verify integrity
subtasks.testStrategy: node -e "console.log(typeof hl)" succeeds

subtasks.title: Create Application Entry Point
subtasks.description: CREATE main.js with q5.js application initialization
subtasks.details: Create main.js with basic q5.js setup and WebGPU renderer initialization
subtasks.testStrategy: npm run dev shows canvas rendering

tasks.title: q5.js Core Integration
tasks.description: Initialize q5.js with WebGPU renderer, implement setup() and draw() functions with performance monitoring
tasks.details: Set up q5.js with WebGPU acceleration, create animation loop, and add performance monitoring
tasks.testStrategy: npm run dev shows 60fps WebGPU-accelerated animation

subtasks.title: Initialize q5.js WebGPU Renderer
subtasks.description: CREATE src/core/Q5App.js with WebGPU renderer and Canvas 2D fallback
subtasks.details: Initialize q5.js with WebGPU renderer, implement fallback detection and Canvas 2D backup
subtasks.testStrategy: WebGPU context creation verified in dev tools

subtasks.title: Implement Animation Loop
subtasks.description: MODIFY main.js to initialize Q5App with proper error handling and animation loop
subtasks.details: Set up q5.js setup() and draw() functions with 60fps target frame rate
subtasks.testStrategy: 60fps animation verified with frame rate counter

subtasks.title: Add Performance Monitoring
subtasks.description: CREATE src/core/PerformanceMonitor.js with FPS and memory tracking
subtasks.details: Implement real-time FPS counter and memory usage monitoring
subtasks.testStrategy: Performance metrics display correctly during animation

tasks.title: hl-gen.js Integration
tasks.description: Integrate hl-gen.js for deterministic randomness, token metadata, and preview capture
tasks.details: Set up highlight.xyz platform integration with deterministic random number generation and NFT metadata
tasks.testStrategy: node test/hlgen-test.js shows deterministic output and metadata generation

subtasks.title: Create hl-gen.js Integration Layer
subtasks.description: CREATE src/blockchain/HLGenIntegration.js with error handling wrapper
subtasks.details: Wrap hl-gen.js functions with error handling and validation
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration functions work without errors

subtasks.title: Implement Token Metadata System
subtasks.description: CREATE src/blockchain/TokenMetadata.js for trait and metadata generation
subtasks.details: Generate token traits, names, descriptions, and rarity information
subtasks.testStrategy: Metadata generation produces valid JSON structure

subtasks.title: Setup Testing Framework
subtasks.description: CREATE test/hlgen-test.js for deterministic randomness validation
subtasks.details: Test deterministic randomness consistency and metadata generation
subtasks.testStrategy: Same seed produces identical output across runs

tasks.title: State Management System
tasks.description: Convert React useState to q5.js state object with 20+ parameter management
tasks.details: Implement object-based state system replacing React hooks with parameter validation and persistence
tasks.testStrategy: node test/state-test.js verifies all parameters accessible and modifiable

subtasks.title: Create Core State System
subtasks.description: CREATE src/core/AppState.js converting React useState to object-based state
subtasks.details: Convert 20+ React state variables to centralized state object
subtasks.testStrategy: All state parameters accessible and modifiable

subtasks.title: Implement State Manager
subtasks.description: CREATE src/core/StateManager.js with persistence and validation
subtasks.details: Add state persistence, parameter validation, and update mechanisms
subtasks.testStrategy: State persists across sessions and validates correctly

subtasks.title: Define Parameter Configuration
subtasks.description: CREATE config/parameters.js with parameter ranges and validation rules
subtasks.details: Define parameter ranges, default values, and validation rules
subtasks.testStrategy: Parameter validation prevents invalid values

tasks.title: Animation Engine Migration
tasks.description: Convert useCanvasAnimation hook to q5.js animation class with frame rate control
tasks.details: Replace React animation hooks with q5.js animation engine using millis() for time-based animation
tasks.testStrategy: npm run test-animation shows smooth 60fps animation

subtasks.title: Convert Animation Hook to Class
subtasks.description: CREATE src/core/AnimationEngine.js converting useCanvasAnimation to q5.js class
subtasks.details: Convert React animation hook to q5.js animation class with proper timing
subtasks.testStrategy: Animation loop runs smoothly without React dependencies

subtasks.title: Replace React Refs with q5.js Variables
subtasks.description: MODIFY src/core/AnimationEngine.js replacing React refs with q5.js variables
subtasks.details: Replace React useRef with q5.js global variables and millis() timing
subtasks.testStrategy: Time-based animation works correctly with q5.js timing

subtasks.title: Implement Frame Rate Controller
subtasks.description: CREATE src/core/FrameRateController.js with adaptive performance optimization
subtasks.details: Add adaptive frame rate control and performance optimization
subtasks.testStrategy: Frame rate adapts to device capabilities

tasks.title: SVG Masking Implementation
tasks.description: Convert Path2D clipping to q5.js beginClip/endClip with responsive logo scaling
tasks.details: Implement SVG masking using q5.js clipping functions with responsive scaling
tasks.testStrategy: node test/svg-mask-test.js shows proper logo masking

subtasks.title: Convert SVG Clipping to q5.js
subtasks.description: CREATE src/graphics/SVGMask.js converting Path2D to q5.js clipping
subtasks.details: Convert Path2D clipping to q5.js beginClip/endClip functions
subtasks.testStrategy: SVG masking works correctly with q5.js

subtasks.title: Implement SVG Path Parser
subtasks.description: CREATE src/graphics/SVGPathParser.js for q5.js path rendering
subtasks.details: Parse SVG path data and convert to q5.js path commands
subtasks.testStrategy: SVG paths render correctly in q5.js

subtasks.title: Add Responsive Logo Rendering
subtasks.description: CREATE src/graphics/LogoRenderer.js with responsive scaling
subtasks.details: Implement responsive logo scaling and positioning
subtasks.testStrategy: Logo scales correctly on different screen sizes

tasks.title: Pattern System Foundation

subtasks.title: Implement Pattern Factory
subtasks.description: CREATE src/patterns/PatternFactory.js with WebGPU optimizations

subtasks.title: Add Pattern Utilities
subtasks.description: CREATE src/patterns/PatternUtils.js with q5.js color blending

subtasks.title: Add Pattern Testing

subtasks.description: CREATE src/patterns/InterferenceOptimizer.js with WebGPU optimizations
